source.29d847c4: These dataset are about impact of COVID-19 pandemic to lobal economy on 2020. These data take from 2 csv datasets (impact COVID-19 ton 170 countries and unemployment rate on OECD countries). These data respect to total deaths, total cases, Human Development Index (HDI), GDP per Capita, unemployment rate, and country names.
